SELECT dict_type_id AS dictTypeId, dict_type_class AS dictTypeClass, dict_type_code AS dictTypeCode, dict_type_name AS dictTypeName, dict_type_desc AS dictTypeDesc, order_no AS orderNo, status AS status FROM biemo_sys_dict_type where del_flag = 'N'
AND dict_type_name like CONCAT('%',#{dictTypeInfo.dictTypeName},'%')
AND dict_type_desc like CONCAT('%',#{dictTypeInfo.dictTypeDesc},'%')
AND dict_type_code like CONCAT('%',#{dictTypeInfo.dictTypeCode},'%')
AND status = #{dictTypeInfo.status}
ORDER BY order_no
